org.apache.log4j.spi.Decoder

Packages that use Decoder
org.apache.log4j.xml XML based components.  
 

Uses of Decoder in org.apache.log4j.xml
 

Classes in org.apache.log4j.xml that implement Decoder
 class UtilLoggingXMLDecoder
          Decodes JDK 1.4's java.util.logging package events delivered via XML (using the logger.dtd).
 class XMLDecoder
          Decodes Logging Events in XML formated into elements that are used by Chainsaw.
